slave.name: DisplayedRoomTemp
slave.label: displayed room temperature
raw value current room temperature and sensorstate (without any correction)
current outdoor temperature and sensorstate

slave.name: StatusDcf
slave.label: status of the DCF signal (0x00 = no DCF-Signal detected / no RTC value; 0x01 = DCF-signal detected; 0x02 = DCF-signal is being interpreted; 0x03 = DCF-data valid; 0x04 = RTC-data is valid)

slave.name: IsInHoliday
slave.label: holidays active

template.name: Hc1OPMode
template.label: operation mode of the first heating circuit

template.name: Hc1NightTemp
template.label: lowering temperature setpoint of the first heating circuit

template.name: Hc1HeatCurve
template.label: heating curve of the first heating circuit

template.name: Hc1ManualOPRoomTempDesired
template.label: room setpoint in operation mode manual of the first heating circuit

slave.name: Hc1QuickVetoTemp
slave.label: manual override setpoint of the first heating circuit

slave.name: Hc1QuickVetoActive
slave.label: manual override of the first heating circuit enabled

template.label: labelling of the first heating circuit
labelling of the second heating circuit
labelling of the domestic hot water circuit

template.name: HwcOPMode
template.label: operation mode of the domestic hot water circuit

template.name: HwcTempDesired
template.label: setpoint of domestic hot water circuit

slave.name: HwcQuickVetoTemp
slave.label: manual override setpoint for the domestic hot water circuit

slave.name: HwcQuickVetoActive
slave.label: manual override of the domestic hot water circuit enabled

template.name: HwcManualOPTempDesired
template.label: setpoint of domestic hot water circuit in manual operation mode

template.name: SummerWinterTimeAdjust
template.label: enable automatic switching over to daylight saving's time (when a DCF receiver is connected to the BMU the value is set fix to ON)

slave.name: DisplayedHwcStorageTemp
slave.label: display of the storage's temperature in C4 (also in case of an SP1error)

slave.name: DisplayedHc1RoomTempDesired
slave.label: 0= >5Â°C, currently displayed room temperature setpoint

slave.name: RoomTempCorrection
slave.label: room temperature correction

template.name: FrostOverRideTime
template.label: delay before frost protection is activated

slave.name: BaseDisplay
slave.label: selection which heating circuit's parameters are shown in the basic display

template.name: Hc1RoomTempSwitchOn
template.label: room temperature modulation of the first heating circuit

template.name: Hc1MinimalFlowTempDesired
template.label: minimum flow temperature setpoint (end emphasis) of the first heating circuit

template.name: Hc1HcType
template.label: type of the first heating circuit

template.name: Hc1SummerOffset
template.label: summer offset of the first heating circuit (if outside temperature > room setpoint + summer offset => heating is OFF;applies to comfort and night setback setpoint; no influence if room temperature modulation is set to "thermostat")

slave.name: Hc1ActualFlowTempDesired
slave.label: calculated flow temperature setpoint of the first heating circuit

template.name: HwcLoadingOffset
template.label: flow temperature's tank loading offset (flow setpoint of the DHW circuit = DHW setpoint + flow temperature's tank loading offset; only relevant if DHW control is done by control)

template.name: HwcPressLowpostrunningtime
template.label: duration of the tank loading pump's lag (only relevant if DHW control is done by control)

template.name: HwcLegioStartDay
template.label: weekday on which legionella protection is started (may also be every day of the week)

template.name: HwcLegioStartTime
template.label: time on which legionella protection is started

template.name: HwcCircuitActive
template.label: domestic hot water circuit is enabled

template.name: ContinuosHeating
template.label: -26=off, when the outside temperature falls below this threshold temperature the continuous heating function is started (off <=> function is disabled)

template.name: PreheatingTime
template.label: in steps of 10, maximum time of enabling the heating before the heating time window starts

template.name: PreStopTime
template.label: in steps of 10, maximum time of starting the lowering operation before the heating time window ends

template.name: ExcessTemp
template.label: excess temperature (flow temperature's setpoint is increased by this value to keep the mixing valve in its control range)

slave.label: first part of the installer's telephone number
second part of the installer's telephone number

template.name: MaintenanceDate
template.label: date of the next maintenance service

template.name: PumpBlockingTimeMax
template.label: 0=off, heating circuit pump's maximum blocking time for pump's energy saving function

slave.name: CirPump
slave.label: circulation pump's state

slave.name: Hc1Pump
slave.label: first heating circuit pump's state

template.name: Hc2HcType
template.label: type of the second heating circuit

slave.name: HwcActualTempDesired
slave.label: current domestic hot water setpoint
value of either an externally connected flow temperature sensor or the BMU's internal flow sensor if an external sensor is missing

slave.name: RFQualityOTDCF
slave.label: RF quality of the connection between VR20/21 and base station

slave.name: RFQualityCI
slave.label: RF quality of the connection between CI and base station

slave.name: StartEepromUpdate
slave.label: update of the EEPROM is to be started

slave.name: EepromUpdateActive
slave.label: update of the EEPROM has been started

slave.name: RoomTempOffsetSelfWarming
slave.label: room temperature intrinsic heating offset

slave.name: CountryVariant
slave.label: country variant (0 = west, 1 = east)

slave.name: ActualRoomTempDesiredHc1
slave.label: current room setpoint considering all basic conditions passed to the control algorithms

slave.name: SolModuleDetected
slave.label: indicates that a VR68 has been detected

slave.name: HcMc1Detected
slave.label: indicates that a VR61 has been detected

slave.name: HRUDetected
slave.label: indicates that an airvent module / a heat recovery unit has been detected

slave.name: ACTOstorDetected
slave.label: indicates that an ACTOstor has been detected

slave.name: BMUB51101ErrorStatus
slave.label: error state of BMU received via eBUS service B51101

slave.name: BMUB51101StorageTemp
slave.label: hot water storage temperature received via eBUS service B5 11 01

slave.name: LegioProtectActive
slave.label: legionella protection is active

slave.name: BMUB51101HwcState
slave.label: flame is on because of either tapping or tank loading
current external flow temperature and sensorstate

slave.name: BMUB51101BoilerFlowTemp
slave.label: current flow temperature inside the BMU

slave.name: EnermanState
slave.label: current energy-manager-state (Off = 0, Heating = 1, DHW = 2, DHW pump lag = 3)

slave.name: B51000TempDesiredLoadingPump
slave.label: loading pump's setpoint sent via B5 10 00 to the BMU

slave.name: HcMc1CPLPState
slave.label: nominal condition of the VR61's circulation or loading pump

slave.name: CPLPLast24started
slave.label: circulation respectively loading pump has been started during the last 24h

slave.name: Hc1PumpLast24started
slave.label: first heating circuit's pump has been started during the last 24h

slave.name: FrostProtectStateMonitor
slave.label: monitoring of the frost protection's state transition diagram

slave.name: FrostProtectionRequiredMonitor
slave.label: frost protection should be enabled

slave.name: Hc1PreOrContinuosHeatingActive
slave.label: preheating or continous heating is active for the first heating circuit

slave.name: CalculatedKickStopTime
slave.label: calculated time in between two pump kicks during frostprotection (time depends on outside temperature)

slave.name: B51000FlowSetMonitor
slave.label: flow temperature setpoint sent via B5 10 00 to the BMU

slave.name: FrostProtectDelayMonitor
slave.label: frost protection delay has not elapsed yet

slave.name: ChimneySweepModeActive
slave.label: chimney sweep mode has been enabled by the BMU

slave.name: PumpEnergySaveStateMonitor
slave.label: monitoring of the pump energy saving's state transition diagram

slave.name: PumpEnergySaveCalculatedTimeMonitor
slave.label: calculated time for the heating circuit's pump's switch off time during pump energy saving function (depends on outside temperature)

slave.name: HwcLoadingIn430Active
slave.label: DHW-loading is active in non parallel loading cases

slave.name: actoSTOROPMode
slave.label: Zustands-Automat actSTOR Ansteuerung

slave.name: HwcLoadingInBMUActive
slave.label: indicates that BMU is in DHW preparation
